articles.description: While the discussions are private, chairman Sajjan Jindal has on several occasions shown the steel-to-energy group's desire to manufacture EVs in the country

articles.title: Shankar Sharma portfolio stock Brightcom Group hits lower circuit on 8th consecutive day | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Brightcom Group share price: On a monthly scale, Brightcom Group shares fell 20 per cent in July and 33 per cent in August. On the first day of September today, the stock continued its losing streak, falling 5 per cent.
articles.content: Brightcom Group share price was locked in its lower circuit as the stock opened at its 5 per cent lower price band of 16.08 on BSE on Friday. Shankar Sharma portfolio stock Brightcom Group has been h… [+4360 chars]

articles.title: Rupee opens higher against dollar on GDP boost - Moneycontrol
articles.description: India's economy exceeded expectations by growing 7.8 percent in the April-June quarter and would further attract overseas money flow, analysts have said
articles.content:
The rupee on September 1 opened higher against the US dollar after India's gross domestic product data came better than expected.
